surface_layer.definition: A component in a battery that prevents direct contact between the anode and cathode while allowing lithium ions to pass.
common_uses: In batteries to prevent short circuits

deep_layer.mechanism: The separator acts as a physical barrier and facilitates ion transport.
deep_layer.origin: Manufactured as a component of a battery.

capabilities: Prevent direct contact between anode and cathode
Enable the exchange of lithium ions

citations: A review of lithium-ion battery safety concerns
